description:
OMG aliens have invaded Earth! Towns, cities, deserts, popular tourist attractions, they're everywhere! Somehow, as usual, Earth only has one person capable of taking them on. Some kind of super soldier, perhaps.

Wait a moment - it’s YOU! Take on the role of Earth's last super soldier or whatever and eliminate the alien menace as you blast your way around the world taking on countless hordes of enemies!

Use bullet time to get out of sticky situations, collect the power ups to enhance your firepower, but don't forget to regularly boost your multiplier to rack up those massive scores!

FEATURES:
- Intense old-school, twin-stick arcade action!
- 30 missions set across real world locations – and beyond!
- Bonus: Mobotron, Alien Deathvaders and Berzerker Death Mob modes!
- Bullet time to help you in those desperate situations!
- Hordes of aliens to blast your way through!
- Loads of power ups! Loads of ‘em!
name: Alien Death Mob
